comment.author: 93462112@N03
comment._content: This is my father in law and his first wife!! My husband stumbled upon it and was not sure if it was his father, when I saw it I knew right away it was because of his fathers mannerisms ...the sitting, the hands, the feet not to mention the much younger profile...he is 85 now and still kicking! Anyway my husband prints the picture out and shows his dad who confirms it is indeed him and his first wife and he was so surprised to see it online! What a small world :D
